name: Global Congress on Innovations in Physiotherapy & Rehabilitation Medicine
content: Physiotherapy in the age of Covid-19: Adapting to a New Reality, is very apt for the occasion, recovering our professional lives and careers after the damaging effects of the pandemic COVID 19 to our practices. These innovations and solutions will be presented in the form of lectures, from eminent speakers from across the world, scientific poster presentations, and a young researchers forum.
